price: Na uwape khabari za wageni wa Ibrahim.
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie pia, katika kubainisha rehema yangu makhsusi katika dunia na adhabu yangu kwa wenye kuasi humo, khabari ya Malaika walio mfikia Ibrahim kama wageni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
